message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper focuses on the statistical challenge of federated learning when local data is non-IID, which is a common problem in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also uses the CIFAR-10 dataset, which is a popular computer vision dataset, suggesting that it could also belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper proposes a strategy to improve training on non-IID data, which could be relevant to the field of control systems, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible category as well.
